items.title: I'm helping my dog vibe code games
items.description: My cavapoo Momo vibe coded playable Godot games. All I had to do was teach her to type, route her input to Claude Code, and build the right tools.

items.title: I pitched a roller coaster to Disneyland at age 10 in 1978
How we rebuilt Next.js with AI in one week
items.description: One engineer used AI to rebuild Next.js on Vite in a week. vinext builds up to 4x faster, produces 57% smaller bundles, and deploys to Cloudflare Workers with a single command.

items.title: OpenAI, the US government and Persona built an identity surveillance machine
items.description: 53MB of source code leaked from a government endpoint. 269 verification checks. biometric face databases. SAR filings to FinCEN. and the same company that verifies your ChatGPT account.

items.title: IDF killed Gaza aid workers at point blank range in 2025 massacre: Report
items.description: A minute-by-minute reconstruction of the massacre by Earshot and Forensic Architecture found Israeli soldiers fired over 900 bullets at the aid workers, killing 15.
